item.title: S Jaishankar's Key Gulf Meet In Saudi Amid India's Big Middle East Push
item.description: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar arrived in Saudi Arabia today to take part in the First India-Gulf Cooperation Council (GCC) Foreign Ministers' Meeting.

item.title: Spain to grant asylum to Venezuelan opposition leader Edmundo Gonzalez Urrutia
item.description: Spain's foreign minister confirmed that asylum will be provided to Venezuelan opposition leader Edmundo Gonzalez Urrutia. After challenging President Maduro's re-election and facing an arrest warrant, Gonzalez sought refuge in the Spanish embassy in Caracas. He left Venezuela on a Spanish military aircraft, with safe passage granted by the Maduro government for political peace.

item.title: Leftwing Green party members form ‘anti-capitalist’ pressure group
item.description:
Provisionally known as Greens Organise, the collective will fight ‘electoral assimilation’ and push for radical policies

Leftwing members of the Green party are calling for a shift towards an “internationalist, anti-capitalist and ecologically transformative agenda” as they launch a new group at their party’s conference this weekend.

The new collective aims to combine the party’s traditional environmentalist politics with “new strands of ecological consciousness, from river pollution and right to roam campaigns to an internationalist and decolonial climate justice movement”.

Continue reading...

item.title: Trump threatens lawyers, donors and election officials with prison for 'unscrupulous behavior'
